overview: Bank clerk Virgil Stewart infiltrates a band of land pirates on the Natchez Trace, and learns bandit leader John Morrow's ambitious plans will lead to bloody revolution between slaveholders and slaves if they aren't stopped.
tagline: The TRUE story of JOHN MURRELL, Ruler of the LUSTY WILDERNESS TRAIL . . . known as the -- "NATCHEZ TRACE" -- a FORTUNE or a FEMALE . . JOHN MURRELL took what he wanted!
title: Natchez Trace
